verses.verse: And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you: <S%H3588>though<s%> you were <S%H599>angry<s%> with me, your <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H7725>turned<s%> away, and you <S%H5162>comforted<s%> me.

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is my <S%H3444>salvation;<s%> I will <S%H982>trust,<s%> and not be <S%H6342>afraid:<s%> for the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H3068>JEHOVAH<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and my <S%H2176>song;<s%> he also is <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
Therefore with <S%H8342>joy<s%> shall you <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H4599>wells<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3034>Praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> on his <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3045>declare<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%> among the <S%H5971>people,<s%> make <S%H2142>mention<s%> that his <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7682>exalted.<s%>
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for he has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H1348>excellent<s%> things: <S%H2063>this<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H6670>Cry<s%> out and <S%H7442>shout,<s%> you <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you.
